title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan conceals her baby bump in a flowy leaf print dress at her book launch
text:
She announced she's expecting her second child in September, her first with boyfriend Steve Kazee.

And pregnant Jenna Dewan kept up with her busy work schedule as she celebrated the launch of her new self-help book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance at The Grove's Barnes & Noble in Los Angeles on Tuesday evening.

The Berlin, I Love You actress, 38, concealed her blossoming baby bump in a flowy green maxi dress, embellished with leaf printing throughout.

Cheery: Jenna Dewan celebrated the launch of her new self-help book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance at The Grove's Barnes & Noble in Los Angeles on Tuesday

Toning down her patterned ensemble, the screen star flashed a hint of her red pedicure in black strappy heels.

The Wedding Year actress ensured focus remained on her sensational outfit as she kept accessories to a minimum at the event.

With her chocolate-coloured tresses styled into loose waves, Jenna complemented her beauty with a generous sweep of make-up.

Radiant: The Berlin, I Love You actress, 38, concealed her blossoming baby bump in a flowy green maxi dress, embellished with leaf printing throughout

Less is more: The Wedding Year actress ensured focus remained on her sensational outfit as she kept accessories to a minimum at the event

Glowing: With her chocolate-coloured tresses styled into loose waves, Jenna complemented her beauty with a generous sweep of make-up

In good spirits: The TV and film star was in her element as she spoke to fans at the event

In her book, the Supergirl star shed light on her divorce from Channing Tatum, who is currently dating British singer Jessie J, 31.

An excerpt from Gracefully You reads: 'First and foremost I had to accept the realization this isn't working and had moved into hurting.'

She added: 'I'd come to realize the dynamic I was in wasn't serving me nor was it serving my daughter.'

The former backup dancer recently gushed about her new Tony-award winning beau Steve, telling US Weekly she was left in tears after meeting him for the first time.

Exciting times ahead: The former back-up dancer announced she's expecting her second child in September, her first with boyfriend Steve Kazee

Candid: In her book, the Supergirl star shed light on her divorce from Channing Tatum (pictured together with daughter Everly, now six, in 2016)

'He was in a show called Once on Broadway, seven years ago, and I went to see the show, and I was blown away by him and his talent, crying my eyes out. And I took my mom, and we got to meet him. "Oh, my God, you were amazing!"'

Following her split from husband of nine years Channing, 39, who share daughter Everly, six, Jenna explained Steve reached out to her.

'He was like, "I never forgot meeting you." That was a really cool moment. Like I say all the time, "The universe works in very mysterious wonderful ways."'
description: The Berlin, I Love You actress, 38, kept up with her busy work schedule as she celebrated the launch of her new self-help book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance in LA on Tuesday.
